title: Getting off map 30
creator_credit: Anna Poletti, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: For the fourteen years that Anna Poletti has lived in Melbourne, her various residences have had one thing in common - you can locate them all on map 30 of the Melways street directory. She pays homage to the streets and intersections of her neighbourhood.
creator_credit_for_label: Anna Poletti, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
